MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the DG11 postcode area of Lockerbie. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9:30am to safely replace a damaged pole near Bank Hill and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:32am on Tuesday, 06 April 2021
